title: Commemorative Ribbon Bookmark, 1976
medium:
Medium: rayon and Terylene
Technique: continuous supplementary weft in a plain weave foundation
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 24 x 6 cm (9 7/16 x 2 3/8 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of Textiles Fund
description: Portrait of "JAMES E. CARTER, 39TH PRESIDENT" above the seal of the President of the United States. At top: two crossed U.S. flags; "INAUGURATION OF THE PRESIDENT, JANUARY 20, 1977"; followed by THE OATH: "I do solemnly swear that I will faithfully execute the office of the President of the United States, and to the best of my ability preserve, protect, and defend the Constitution of the United States." Lower left corner: small eagle. Lower right corner: logo with letter BN&H.

tombstone.epitaph:
Commemorative Ribbon Bookmark, 1976.
1976. Medium: rayon and Terylene
Technique: continuous supplementary weft in a plain weave foundation. Museum purchase from Friends of Textiles Fund. 1977-4-1.
